survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Air Quality Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with the air quality in their workplace, identifying areas for improvement to enhance comfort and productivity.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current air quality in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current air quality in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following air quality issues have you experienced in your workplace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow for multiple selections to identify common issues.

script.question_text: Which of the following air quality issues have you experienced in your workplace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort due to air quality in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to gauge how often issues occur.

script.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort due to air quality in your workplace?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance air quality in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture specific suggestions. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance air quality in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that poor air quality affects your productivity at work?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple scale to measure impact on productivity.
